Listed Companies

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

AppSource

AppSource is a Philippines based IT and Consulting Company.
AppSource current has a team of over 150 IT & software developers

AppSource clients includes some of the biggest organizations in the world: Asian Development Bank. EastWest Bank. Islamic Bank. National Police Commission. Trend Micro. USAID etc.

AppSource plans to list by the 1st.Quarter of 2017
AppSource is expected a market value of US$300 Million upon its listing

Visit Website

British Cambridge College

British Cambridge College develops a wide range of programs which are accredited by various awarding and accrediting bodies in the United Kingdom.

Currently more than 50 universities, colleges and schools are currently offering our programs at their campuses and centers.

Visit Website

Board Members

Dr. Eduardo Cabantog

Chief Executive Officer of Alliance in Motion (AIM) Global

AIM Global is one of the largest direct marketing company with over one million distributors and members across Asia. Dr. Cabantog is also a Director of British Cambridge Inc. and AIM Cambridge College Inc. Dr. Cabantog received a Doctor of Medicine from the University of the City of Manila, and was a resident Doctor at the Makati Medical Center from 1999 to 2002.

Hatadi Shapiro Supaat

President & COB of British Cambridge, Inc

Mr. Supaat graduated with a degree in Bible Counseling from Christian Bible College and with a Diploma in Business Administration from Cambridge College. From 1994 to 2001 he served as Chief Executive Officer of First World Technologies and from 2008 to 2014 he was the Chief Executive Officer of British Academics. From 2011 to Present he has also served as Chairman of British Cambridge College Inc.
